scriptella.interactive

Interface ProgressIndicator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleProgressIndicator, ProgressIndicatorBase, SwingProgressIndicator

    public interface ProgressIndicator
    Script execution progress indicator.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fyodor Kupolov

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void showProgress(double progress, java.lang.String message)
      Invoked when script execution progress has been changed.

    • Method Detail

      • showProgress

        void showProgress(double progress,
                java.lang.String message)
        Invoked when script execution progress has been changed.
        Parameters:
        progress - progress value between 0 and 1 inclusive.
        message - completed event description.
